marklogic.body: Generally speaking unless Afghanis were conquering a good chunk of India (and Pakistan) most people didn't much care about what happened in Afghanistan unless the Afghanis were Raiding (looting) and killing their peasant farmers in the border areas. Maybe we should retreat to that happier time, give up on trying to make their interpersonal relationships part of the 21st century (if you want to Burn your wife and keep women uneducated and in servitude it is your problem, not mine). It is time to recognize NATO made the good effort but ignorance and criminality didn't let it work. As Canuck172 said, either go in big time, or stay out. If terrorist camps are set up bomb then from 40,000 feet and let it be known if the camps continue the electrical and irrigation systems are next.
